00046 #include "compiler.h"
00047 #include "unicode.h"

00059 U8    unicode_header_scan( U8* header )
00060 {
00061    if( (header[0] == 0xEF)
00062    &&  (header[1] == 0xBB)
00063    &&  (header[2] == 0xBF) )
00064    {
00065       return UNI_TYPE_UTF8;
00066    }
00067    if( (header[0] == 0xFE)
00068    &&  (header[1] == 0xFF) )
00069    {
00070       return UNI_TYPE_UTF16BE;
00071    }
00072    if( (header[0] == 0xFF)
00073    &&  (header[1] == 0xFE) )
00074    {
00075       return UNI_TYPE_UTF16LE;
00076    }
00077    return UNI_TYPE_ASCII;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00088 U8    unicode_header_get( U8* header, U8 txt_format )
00089 {
00090    switch( txt_format )
00091    {
00092       case UNI_TYPE_UTF8:
00093       header[0] = 0xEF;
00094       header[1] = 0xBB;
00095       header[2] = 0xBF;
00096       return 3;
00097 
00098       case UNI_TYPE_UTF16BE:
00099       header[0] = 0xFE;
00100       header[1] = 0xFF;
00101       return 2;
00102 
00103       case UNI_TYPE_UTF16LE:
00104       header[0] = 0xFF;
00105       header[1] = 0xFE;
00106       return 2;
00107    }
00108    return 0;
00109 }
00110 
00118 U8    utf8_to_unicode( U8* utf8, U16* unicode )
00119 {
00120    U8 c0,c1,c2;
00121 
00122    // Take 3 bytes
00123    c0 = utf8[0];
00124    c1 = utf8[1];
00125    c2 = utf8[2];
00126    
00127    if( 0x00 == (c0 & 0x80) )
00128    {
00129       *unicode = c0;
00130       return 1;
00131    }
00132    if( 0xC0 == (c0 & 0xE0) )
00133    {
00134       *unicode = ((U16)(c0 & 0x1F)<<6) | ((U16)(c1 & 0x3F));
00135       return 2;
00136    }
00137    if( 0xE0 == (c0 & 0xF0) )
00138    {
00139       *unicode = ((U16)(c0 & 0x0F)<<(6+6)) | ((U16)(c1 & 0x3F)<<(6)) | ((U16)(c2 & 0x3F));
00140       return 3;
00141    }
00142    // Error !
00143    *unicode = c0;
00144    return 1;
00145 }
